Text:
there is some problem with lecture-9  Hierarchy And Urbanism - 'Ubaid Mesopotamia .it suddenly stops at 8:30,and then only resumes at around 28:00.if you can fix this it will be great plus if there is a guidebook pls upload it.
thanks a lot for your lectures.
Sorry, I'm afraid I don't have access to a fix for lecture 9 from origin of civilization, nor the guidebook. Perhaps it will show up at some point somewhere online.
